title: _INVALIDATE_VEHICLE_IDLE_CAM
content:
0x9E4CFFF9892584720x65DDE8AF// InvalidateVehicleIdleCam
void _INVALIDATE_VEHICLE_IDLE_CAM();Resets the vehicle idle camera timer. Calling this in a loop will disable the idle camera.Examples:LuaCitizen.CreateThread(function()
	while true do
		InvalidateIdleCam()
		InvalidateVehicleIdleCam()
		Wait(1000) --The idle camera activates after 30 second so we don't need to call this per frame
	end
end)
codeBlocks:
Citizen.CreateThread(function()
	while true do
		InvalidateIdleCam()
		InvalidateVehicleIdleCam()
		Wait(1000) --The idle camera activates after 30 second so we don't need to call this per frame
	end
end)
